nmaprun.args: nmap -vv --reason -Pn -T4 --min-rate=1000 -sV -p 80 "--script=banner,(http* or ssl*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or http-slowloris* or fuzzer)" -oN /home/parallels/HacktheBox/Machines/10.10.11.186-MetaTwo/results/10.10.11.186/scans/tcp80/tcp_80_http_nmap.txt -oX /home/parallels/HacktheBox/Machines/10.10.11.186-MetaTwo/results/10.10.11.186/scans/tcp80/xml/tcp_80_http_nmap.xml 10.10.11.186
